subject: I think I bought the wrong one
description_text:
Hello mate,

I want to buy the Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor.
But I think I accidentally clicked and bought the wrong one.
Could you please resolve this?
Thanks

conversations.body_text:
Hi, NathanaÃ«l Mullier,
Hello, have you already placed your order? If not, please refer to the link below to place your order.
https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor

Hello,

But no, I made the correct order.

My mistake.

Thanks for the help.

Fri. June 13, 2025 at 05:52, service@simsonn.com
